name: Kahlthus
description:
Bring things together. Move your avatar and  push a button to attract all things.

Game created for GMTK Game Jam 2021.

  • 48 hours time span
  • Everything created by Rafael Hernandez Pereira during game jam:
    • Graphics, by using own photos and photos from Pexels, cutting and filtering them in Photoshop
    • Music with Korg Gadget 2 on iPad
    • Coding all in C# in Unity
    • No Unity Physics "Joints" have been used!
